agave
Class Destinations

java.lang.Object
  agave.Destinations

public final class Destinations
extends java.lang.Object

A factory class for creating Destinations.

Author:
Damian Carrillo
See Also:
Destination

static Destination create(java.lang.String path)
          Creates a new Destination within the deployed context.
static Destination forward(java.lang.String path)
          Creates a new Destination within the deployed context that will be forwarded to.

          Creates a new Destination within the deployed context that will be redirected to.

Constructor Detail

Destinations

public Destinations()
Method Detail

create

public static Destination create(java.lang.String path)
Creates a new Destination within the deployed context. The destination will be redirected to if the HTTP request method was a POST, otherwise it will be forwarded to.

Parameters:
path - the desired destination path relative to the deployed context
Returns:
a constructed Destination

redirect

public static Destination redirect(java.lang.String path)
Creates a new Destination within the deployed context that will be redirected to.

Parameters:
path - the desired destination path relative to the deployed context (eg: /section/resource}
Returns:
a constructed Destination

forward

public static Destination forward(java.lang.String path)
Creates a new Destination within the deployed context that will be forwarded to.

Parameters:
path - the desired resource relative to the context path to forward to (eg: /WEB-INF/jsp/index.jsp)
Returns:
a constructed Destination
